attributes.text:
@notice returns the total amount and total claimed amount of a users vesting schedule.
 @param account the user to retrieve the vesting schedule for.

attributes.type: mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => struct TokenVesting.Schedule storage ref))

attributes.text:
@notice Withdraws TCR tokens from the contract.
 @dev blocks withdrawing locked tokens.

params.amount: the total outstanding amount to be claimed for this vesting schedule.
params.endTime: the timestamp this vesting schedule ends.
params.startTime: the timestamp this vesting schedule started.

cancelVesting(address,uint256).details: Any outstanding tokens are returned to the system.

params.account: the account of the user whos vesting schedule is being cancelled.
the user to retrieve the vesting schedule for.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setVestingSchedule(address,uint256,bool,.details: adds a new Schedule to the schedules mapping.

params.account: the account that a vesting schedule is being set up for. Will be able to claim tokens after                the cliff period.
params.amount: the amount of tokens being vested for the user.
params.cliffWeeks: the number of weeks that the cliff will be present at.
params.isFixed: a flag for if the vesting schedule is fixed or not. Fixed vesting schedules can't be cancelled.
params.vestingWeeks: the number of weeks the tokens will vest over (linearly)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calcDistribution(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: calculates the amount of tokens to distribute to an account at any instance in time, based off some         total claimable amount.

cancelVesting(address,uint256).notice: Allows a vesting schedule to be cancelled.

claim(uint256).notice: allows users to claim vested tokens if the cliff time has passed.

getVesting(address,uint256).notice: returns the total amount and total claimed amount of a users vesting schedule.

setVestingSchedule(address,uint256,bool,.notice: Sets up a vesting schedule for a set user.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws TCR tokens from the contract.
